original: Unlike other large U.S. airlines which mostly use hub-and-spoke systems, Southwest uses point-to-point operations and underwent a massive crew scheduling "meltdown" because most of its pilots and flight attendants were out of position, which resulted in massive numbers of flight cancellations persisting for days after the worst weather had subsided and other airlines had largely recovered.

original: Young's first collection of verse, Genius and Fancy, described as "a survey of the London stage," was published in 1791, went into a second edition in 1795, and then was immediately republished in an expanded edition with three times the number of pages as the original.
simplified: Young's first collection of poetry, Genius and Fancy, was described as "a survey of the London stage". || It was published in 1791, went into a second edition in 1795, and then was republished soon after in an expanded edition, which had three times the number of pages as the original.

original: Stephany initially announced her intent to remain as Minority Leader of the Vermont House while campaigning for mayor, stating that she would turn over day-to-day duties to Assistant Minority Leader Paul N. Poirier.
simplified: Stephany announced she would stay as the Minority Leader of the Vermont House while running for mayor and said she would assign her daily duties to Paul N. Poirier, the Assistant Minority Leader.

original: Stephany initially announced her intent to remain as Minority Leader of the Vermont House while campaigning for mayor, stating that she would turn over day-to-day duties to Assistant Minority Leader Paul N. Poirier.
simplified: At first, Stephany said she would stay as Minority Leader of the Vermont House while campaigning for mayor. || She said that she would turn over day-to-day duties to Assistant Minority Leader Paul N. Poirier.
